Privacy Policy

We take the privacy of the information you send us seriously. Below describes what and how the data you provide us is used when you use the app Windometer.

App Permissions

  • LOCATION

While using the app, and given your consent, your device location is used to obtain real-time weather data.

Analytics

The app collects analytics to improve the app and monitor usage trends. This includes device OS version, app version, crash reports, search queries and usage data. We never store your name, phone number or contact information unless you voluntarily provide this to us.

Ads

This app may display ads to you. The following ad networks, which may use your Advertising ID, and their privacy policies are linked:

  • Google Mobile Ads
